com.jdon.model
类 ModelHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.jdon.model.ModelHandler
所有已实现的接口：
ServiceHandler
直接已知子类：
XmlModelHandler
public abstract class ModelHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceHandler

Presentation layer delegateion class Presentation layer need three common works collaboration with service layer: 1. Presentation layer need a ModelForm instance that include some initially data, these data must obtain from service. 2. Presentation layer must obtain a existed ModelForm instance from service 3. Presentation layer submit the data ModelForm instance that user created or update, service layer must persistence them Framework's user can extends this ModelHandler, and configure your jdonframework.xml, so ask framework active it:

 Model findModelByKey(java.lang.String keyValue, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

          obtain a existed Model instance by his primtive key.
 void formCopyToModel(ModelForm form, Model model)
          for old version below 1.4
 void formCopyToModelIF(ModelForm form, java.lang.Object model)
          ModelForm object's data transfer to Model object default implemention is copy mapping between with them; another implemention: String propertyName = StringUtil.getLastString(model.getClass().getName()); Model hasDataModel = PropertyUtils.getProperty(form, propertyName); model = hasDataModel; extends this class , and override this method

initForm

public ModelForm initForm(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Presentation layer need a ModelForm instance that include some initially data, these data must obtain from service. this method implements these functions in presentation layer's ModelHanlder concrete class; this method is available in pushing create or edit view page

参数：
request -
返回：
ModelForm instance
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

initModel

public Model initModel(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                throws java.lang.Exception
for old version below 1.4

抛出：
java.lang.Exception

initModelIF

public java.lang.Object initModelIF(EventModel em,
                                    ModelForm form,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Presentation layer need a ModelForm instance that include some initially data, these data must obtain from service. this method implements these functions by deleagating service. this mehtod is only availabe in pushing create view page in pushing editable view page, the model is obtained by it's key, not from this method;

参数：
request -
返回：
Model instance
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
另请参见：
CreateViewPageUtil

serviceAction

public abstract void serviceAction(EventModel em,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
package the Model instance that has user's input data to EventModel object, and submit them to servier layer;

指定者：
接口 ServiceHandler 中的 serviceAction
参数：
em - package Model instance
request -
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

modelIFCopyToForm

public void modelIFCopyToForm(java.lang.Object model,
                              ModelForm form)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Model object's data transfer to ModelForm object default implemention is copy mapping between with them; another implemention is : PropertyUtils.setProperty extends this class , and override this method

参数：
model -
form -
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

formCopyToModelIF

public void formCopyToModelIF(ModelForm form,
                              java.lang.Object model)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
ModelForm object's data transfer to Model object default implemention is copy mapping between with them; another implemention: String propertyName = StringUtil.getLastString(model.getClass().getName()); Model hasDataModel = PropertyUtils.getProperty(form, propertyName); model = hasDataModel; extends this class , and override this method

参数：
model -
form -
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
